title: Client Problems
body: Okay guys...So I reinstalled Windows 7 and I downloaded League again...I downloaded the new client and it work since today (2-4-2017)...Now when I click on my Client Launcher it doesn't start...Same for the old one...What should I do? ...I tried closing the launcher process with with Task Manager but it says I haven't got the permission...Please Help! (Sorry for my bad English){{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: Since you mentioned that your OS gives you a permissions error when you try to _close_ League through the task manager, I'm guessing that League isn't opening correctly because of that permission issue also. Check out this [**Permission Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) if you're not sure how to get those settings in place!
